properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:51AM PST until March 1 at 9:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 14 feet at 15 seconds
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 15 to
25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 14 feet at 15
seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point
California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 9 PM
PST this evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM PST
this morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
